alert.note: Alert for Northwest Nicholas; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 17 at 12:19AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Ohio and West Virginia, including the following counties, in southeast Ohio, Gallia and Lawrence OH. In West Virginia, Braxton, Calhoun, Gilmer, Jackson WV, Lewis, Mason, Northwest Nicholas, Northwest Pocahontas, Northwest Randolph, Northwest Webster, Ritchie, Roane, Southeast Nicholas, Southeast Randolph, Southeast Webster, Upshur and Wirt. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Northwest Nicholas; Northwest Pocahontas; Northwest Randolph; Northwest Webster; Southeast Nicholas; Southeast Randolph; Southeast Webster
